parse.title: List of countries by homeless population

text.*:
A global survey in 2005 found that an estimated 100 million people are homeless worldwide. Habitat for Humanity estimated in 2015 that 1.6 billion people around the world live in "inadequate shelter".[1]

This is a list of countries (not all 195) by the homeless population present on any given night.

List[edit]

 Chile 12,000 2014[7] 0.07%
 China 2,579,000 2011[8] 0.18%
 Croatia 462 2013[3] 0.01%
 Czech Republic 68,500 2015[3] 0.65%

 Egypt 2013[10] 18.28% Homelessness in Egypt
 Estonia 864 2011[3] 0.06%
 Finland 7200 2015[3] 0.13%
 France 141,500 2012[11] 0.21% Homelessness in France
 Germany 52,000 2016[12] 0.14% Homelessness in Germany
 Greece 20,000 2013[13] 0.18% Homelessness in Greece
 Grenada 60,000 2004[14] 56.44%
 Guatemala 475,000 2012[15] 3.15%
 Guinea 2012[16] 68.5%

 Israel 1,831 2014[22] 0.02% Homelessness in Israel

 Lithuania 5,000 2014 0.16%
 Luxembourg 1,533 2013[25] 0.28%
 Mexico 40,911 2010[3] 0.04%

 New Zealand 41,207 2015[3] 0.94% Homelessness in New Zealand
 Nigeria 24,400,000 2007[27] 16.58%
 Norway 3,909 2016[28] 0.07%
 Peru 2011[29] 5.6%

 Spain 40,000 2012[35] 0.09% Homelessness in Spain
 Sweden 34,000 2011[36] 0.36% Homelessness in Sweden
  Switzerland 3,000 - 8,000 2016[37] 0.035% - 0.095% Homelessness in Switzerland
 Togo 100,000 1999[38] 2.11%
 Uganda 500,000 2014[39] 1.43%
 Ukraine 1,000,000 2015[40] 2.35%
